long_description: The slash-proof Pacsafe Carrysafe 100 Secure camera strap helps you avoid slash-and-grab theft of your camera or binoculars. Stainless-steel wire is built into the strap to prevent theives from slashing through it. User-friendly connectors allow the strap to be quickly clipped to a camera case without removing it from the camera. Neoprene sleeves cover connector clips for enhanced security. The Pacsafe Carrysafe 100 Secure camera strap is adjustable and features a soft, cushioned neoprene neck pad for carrying comfort.
short_description: The slash-proof Pacsafe Carrysafe 100 Secure camera strap helps you avoid slash-and-grab theft of your camera or binoculars.
